FuncDef: This command creates a policy template related to transport of accounting messages from the BB-ISA card to the accounting server. It also defines accounting attributes that will be included in accounting messages. The policy template will be instantiated once it is applied to the BB-ISA cards in the nat-group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the ISA RADIUS policy that can be referenced by a NAT application.
Keyword used to create the policy.
